snippet: With the legalization of gay marriage in Washington, D.C., and Maryland in recent years, more gay couples are holding their wedding receptions in this area of West Virginia.
abstract: Laura Moser travel article on Lost River area of West Virginia, where more gay couples are holding their wedding receptions in wake of legalization of gay marriage in Washington, DC, and Maryland in recent years.
lead_paragraph: With the legalization of gay marriage in Washington, D.C., and Maryland in recent years, more gay couples are holding their wedding receptions in this area of West Virginia.

headline.main: In the Backwoods of Lost River, a Gay Retreat
